title: Dusk at the Shrine
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>Phew....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Dia-san! Are you done with student council work?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Oh, Chika-san. Yeah, I just finished. Did you come here to get me? Hold on, today’s practice plan should be around here....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ah, wait wait wait, can we change the plan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Change, you say?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yeah. The weather is really nice today, right? I was thinking we could run to the shrine, have a dance practice there, and then watch the sunset!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>The sunset, huh....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>It’ll be so pretty~! I’m sure it’ll help you recover from your student council work! Let’s go watch it with everyone!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu, well, it might be nice once in a while. Let’s do it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yaaay~! Let’s hurry, Dia-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
